items.title: WowWeekend
items.description: Migration of a blog and e-commerce platform from legacy PHP/ASP to Next.js and Payload CMS, along with data crawling and Cloudflare S3 CDN optimization.
items.goals:
Migrate legacy PHP/ASP system to Next.js and Payload CMS.
Develop a crawler tool to extract old articles and optimize fields for MongoDB, migrating AWS S3 images to the new system.
features: Admin Dashboard Schema Management using Payload CMS
Management of products, categories, articles, and images
Full ISR architecture for optimized SEO
unstable_cache for API fetching with revalidateTag/revalidatePath on dashboard triggers
Highly reusable components with unit tests
Migrated AWS S3 storage to Cloudflare Storage and CDN

items.title: WowBuilder
items.description: A drag-and-drop website builder designed for WowWeekend designers to create custom landing pages directly without IT intervention.
items.goals:
WowWeekend has a LongForm category requiring custom landing page UI.
Create a drag-and-drop website builder so Designers can build UIs without IT intervention.
Reduce delivery time and export separate HTML/CSS/JS files for integration.
features: Craft.js integration for the drag-and-drop canvas
Custom builder components: spacer, container, button, Hero, Text, Image, Column...
Local state management through React Context
JSON state persistence via LocalStorage and IndexedDB (Browser Storage)
Documentation for builder components and features

items.title: Jewellery WowWeekend
items.description: A beautiful, SEO-optimized content site specifically focused on reading articles and featuring jewelry products, extended from WowWeekend.
items.goals:
Create a visually appealing, highly SEO-optimized website dedicated to jewelry information.
Migrate jewelry-related articles from the main WowWeekend site.
features: Admin Dashboard Schema Management using Payload CMS
Multiple templates for rendering articles
Full ISR architecture for optimized SEO
unstable_cache for caching API fetch functions
Unit tests for functions and components

items.title: IDM Website & Mobile App
items.description: Revamped the UI/UX for an enterprise website and mobile app, including an integrated RAG-based AI Chatbot to support customer inquiries.
items.goals:
Update the UI and tech stack of the legacy website to an attractive design to draw in customers.
Integrate an AI Chatbot using RAG (OpenAI/Gemini) trained on IDM brand data to assist customers.
features: Highly reusable article templates and components
Optimized page load speed and SEO
Integration of RAG AI chatbot for content consultation

items.title: Laptop TC Store
items.description: An e-commerce website for laptops with a high-performance SSR/SSG architecture, a CMS admin dashboard, and full SEO support.
items.goals: Build an e-commerce website for laptops with excellent SEO and fast page load speeds.
features: Admin dashboard for managing products, categories, and banners
SSR and SSG architecture for SEO optimization
Highly reusable UI components
Page load speed and overall SEO optimization

items.title: TC Phim
items.description: A movie streaming frontend exploring Next.js 16+ Partial Prerendering (PPR), React Compiler, and custom hls.js video controls.
items.goals: Explore Next.js 16 new Partial Prerendering (PPR) component cache structure and optimize frontend movie streaming performance.
features: React Compiler utilization for automatic performance optimization in the page tree
New Next.js 16 caching functions like `use cache`, cacheLife, and cacheTags
Custom UI controls for video player using hls.js

items.title: Auth Module (ASP.NET)
items.description: A reusable monolithic auth module for personal projects managing users, roles, and company profiles using ASP.NET Razor Pages.
items.goals: Build a centralized, reusable Auth module to handle logins, roles, and company management across all personal side-projects.
features: Login/Register UI using ASP.NET Razor Pages
Backend built with ASP.NET Web API and JWT
Entity Framework for database management and authorization
Module packaged via Docker and deployed to Docker Hub

items.title: Image Sharing Platform
items.description: A real-time social image sharing website supporting nested comments, automatic WebP optimization, and WebSocket notifications.
items.goals: Create a real-time image sharing platform with excellent SEO and fast page load speeds.
features: Image management: Firebase Storage upload with automatic WebP optimization
Social interaction: Likes, nested comments, follows, and real-time WebSocket notifications
SEO & Performance optimization: SSR, Dynamic meta tags
Admin Panel for content moderation

items.title: Football Player Value Predictor
items.description: A Machine Learning learning project that crawls Transfermarkt API data, performs EDA, and trains a Decision Tree model to predict player market values.
items.goals:
Learn data crawling using Python via Transfermarkt API.
Practice data cleaning, EDA, and build a Decision Tree model to predict football player market values.
features: Automated API data crawling scripts saving to CSV
Jupyter Notebook workflow: Processing, cleaning, and charting (Matplotlib, Seaborn)
Decision Tree model training and evaluation with Scikit-learn

items.title: Moon App
items.description: A cross-platform React Native mobile application built on Expo SDK 54, showcasing offline persistence via TanStack Query + Async Storage.
items.goals:
Build a cross-platform mobile app using React Native and Expo SDK 54.
Practice server state management combined with Async Storage Persister for offline support.
features: File-based Routing using expo-router
API fetching and caching optimization with TanStack Query for offline capabilities
Complex form validation using react-hook-form and zod
Modular architecture and strict Type-Safe TypeScript

items.title: Eco App (Payload v3)
items.description: An E-commerce boilerplate running Payload CMS v3 smoothly side-by-side on Next.js 15 App Router, supporting Stripe and Next-Intl multi-language.
items.goals:
Build a complete e-commerce boilerplate with the new generation Payload CMS (v3) running directly on Next.js 15+.
Integrate Stripe for payment processing.
features: Content and product management via Payload CMS v3 Dashboard
Checkout processing through Stripe webhooks
UI/UX optimization with Radix UI Primitives and Framer Motion animations
Multi-language (i18n) support using Next-Intl

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: This very personal portfolio built with Astro and React. Features an 'Islands Architecture' for extreme performance, View Transitions, and Awwwards-worthy GSAP scroll animations.
items.goals:
Build an ultra-modern portfolio website to showcase skills with Awwwards-worthy GSAP animations.
Apply Astro's Islands Architecture philosophy for maximum performance.
features: SPA-like smooth routing using Astro View Transitions
Type-safe project management with Astro Content Collections
Mixed React components for complex filter state management
GSAP ScrollTrigger animations and @gsap/react hook integration
System UI Dark/Light mode and CSS Modules styling
